entry.title: [RBX8][Network] - SNC Network equpement Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 3, 13:00 - 14:00 UTC

Oct 10, 21:05 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

entry.title: [BHS][Backbone] - Fiber Incident Notification
entry.content:
Oct 18, 20:18 UTC
Update - Update : The provider technician is on site. The repair should start soon, no ETR for the moment.

Oct 18, 17:06 UTC
Identified - Update : The provider has taken over the incident. We are waiting for their feedback.

Oct 18, 16:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/10/2022 15:21 UTC
Service impact : Latencies may be experienced as a direct result of a fibre cut between BHS and Chicago.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on this issue and have contacted the provider to make a fix. Updates will be posted as soon as significant progress is made.
